subject: Missing Haptics, Order #SSN4937
description_text:
I ordered the Pro X Ultra Pedals w/ Haptics, but never received the haptics. Order #SSN4937. The pedals have arrived on December 24th. I had a tracking number with the pedals (FedEx #887171803971). I’m not sure if the haptics were sent separately and had a different tracking number. The only item in the box was the pedals. If there is not another tracking number then I guess the haptics were never sent. What can I do about this?

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Jayce Ketron,     Here is the tracking number and shipment trace for the vibration motor.
